Tools I Use

Here are some of the tools and technologies I use for GIS work:

  • Desktop GIS: ArcGIS, QGIS
  • Programming: Python (GeoPandas, Shapely), R (sf, tmap)
  • Web Mapping: Leaflet, Mapbox, ArcGIS Online
  • Data Visualization: Tableau, Power BI
  • Spatial Databases: PostgreSQL/PostGIS, SQLite
